item.title: CVE-2017-9283|2024-09-16T19:36:16.330Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20visibroker
item.description: An out-of-bounds read (CWE-125) vulnerability exists in Micro Focus VisiBroker 8.5. The feasibility of leveraging this vulnerability for further attacks was not assessed.
